firstQuestion.questionText: Hoe can we best help you?
firstQuestion.radioButtonLabel2: I want to discuss my general financial situation with an expert

secondQuestion.questionText: What subjects do you need help in?

budgetcoachOption.label: Budgetcoach
budgetcoachOption.description: Specialized in everything related to your expenses and budgeting

financialPlannerOption.label: Financial planner
financialPlannerOption.description: An expert on your broader financial situation and future

PreferenceForSpecificExpert.questionText: Is there a specific person you would like to speak with?

noPreferenceOption.label: No
noPreferenceOption.description: We will connect you with an expert that can best help you

preferenceOption.label: Yes
preferenceOption.description: You can choose from our list of experts

ChooseSpecificExpert.descriptionEnd: are able to help you. Select an expert from our list to easily schedule a 30 minute appointment:
